flow.name: triggerSyncFromA

sfdc:query.doc:name: fetch accounts from A
sfdc:query.query: dsql:SELECT AccountNumber,AccountSource,AnnualRevenue,BillingCity,BillingCountry,BillingPostalCode,BillingState,BillingStreet,Description,Fax,Id,Industry,LastModifiedById,LastModifiedDate,Name,OwnerId,Ownership,ParentId,Phone,Rating,RecordTypeId,ShippingCity,ShippingCountry,ShippingPostalCode,ShippingState,ShippingStreet,Sic,SicDesc,Site,TickerSymbol,Type,Website FROM Account WHERE LastModifiedDate > #[flowVars['lastQueryDateA']] ORDER BY LastModifiedDate ASC LIMIT 200
